Five instruction formats

R-Formats

Instruction like $add$,$mul$

funct7rs2rs1funct3rdopcode
10 in total with funct35510 in total with funct357

I -format

instruction like $addi$ , $muli$

entry.title: c++inheritance
entry.content:
1. To be an interface, a class must only consist of a pure virtual function
  2. To implement an interface, a class must define all of those virtual function
  3. If a class contains at least one virtual function, it’s called an abstract class which can’t be instantiated

entry.title: lvalue and rvalue
entry.content:
lvalue simply means an object that has an identifiable location in memory

rvalue simply means, an object that has no identifiable location in memory

We can assign a variable to rvalue and force it move than copy

entry.title: pyhtonlist
entry.content:
There are four collection data types in the Python programming language:

  • List is a collection which is ordered and changeable. Allows duplicate members.
  • Turple is a collection which is ordered and unchangeable. Allows duplicate members.
  • Set is a collection which is unordered, unchangeable, and unindexed. No duplicate members.
  • Dictionary is a collection which is ordered and changeable. No duplicate members.

form the element to the end.

a list without the last elements

entry.title: Fundamental theorem of calculus
entry.content:
Fundamental theorem of calculus:

First:
$$
\int_{a}^{b}f(x)dx=F(b)-F(a)
$$
when $F’(x)=f(x)$ and $F(x)$ is continuous on $[a,b]$

Second:

when
$$
\int_{a}^{x}f(t)dt=g(x)
$$
and f(x) is continuous on $[a,b]$ and $x \in [a,b]$

then $g’(x)=f(x)$

it can also be written as $\frac{\int^{x}_{a}f(t)dt}{dx}=f(x)$
